name: Powermatte High-Intensity Long-Lasting Lip Pencil
about: What it is: A bold, matte pencil that saturates lips in rich pigment and has up to 12 hours of staying power.Formulation Type: Lip Liner..Benefits: Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients: - Power Pigment Complex: Features color-locking ingredients that saturate lips with bold, comfortable color...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan...What Else You Need to Know:  Potency meets precision with Powermatte High Intensity Lip Pencil, a fully loaded matte lip formula charged with up to 12 hours of staying power. Transformative cream-to-matte texture applies effortlessly and seals in a bold, matte finish. The formula glides on dense color that wears comfortably all day.
ingredients: -Power Pigment Complex: Features color-locking ingredients that saturate lips with bold, comfortable color...Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Caprylyl Methicone, Octyldodecanol, Dicalcium Phosphate, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Lauroyl Lysine, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polysilicone-11, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using the tip of the pencil, line lips before filling them in with color to create a bold, matte look..-Try lining lips with one shade, then filling in lips with a lighter shade for a fuller look with added dimension..-For best results, sharpen pencil before each use with NARS Pencil Sharpener (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really sad to say that the new (more expensive) version of the wonderful Cruella matte lipstick is a real letdown. The  old Cruella Velvet Matte was the truest, most flattering red I have ever found (reds tend to pink out on me) and made my teeth look whiter. The shade of this one tends towards the brickier and makes me teeth look yellow. The new formula is also more matte/dead and quite drying. I will use the crayon I purchased with balm to ease the dryness, but then I will (sadly) be moving on to find something else. The old version was the red lipstick I recommended to anyone who asked what I liked, and I know many people felt that way. I can't understand why NARS changed it, but they have lost a customer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is Fine:  I have this in the velvet matte formula... and honestly, if you build the opacity in the velvet matte....its exactly the same. I feel the same about Cruella.   The Problem: THAT BEING SAID, there is more formula deposited onto the lips with the new formulation... therefore, it does smudge if you don't allow it to set. I put one swipe of each formula and let it set on my hand (no lotion or anything). They both smudged pretty bad after 2 mins. The NEW formual did smudge worse, but again, you're getting more per swipe.... Some pigment stayed behind, leading me to think these would fade nicely like the velvet mattes did. I would rather it fade than deal w chunks.   I even tried setting the new formula with setting powder....still smudged pretty bad.  However, for $30 a crayon, I can't justify waiting 2 mins for them to set and STILL transfer or smudge. Especially since they are touted as longwear. I do feel like the velvet matte held up nicer bc they are a firmer formula (that's the inky way I can think to describe it) upon application.   I'll be returning these bc there are WAY better formulas for cheaper at the drugstore that don't move.  (nyx lingerie is SO GOOD. It's liquid but same effect and just as comfy on the lips)  2 stars for a misleading product name... the only thing POWERful about this is the color payoff..MAYBE (it's honestly no better than anything else...) I would not consider this a longwear product at all.   I wanted this to be good but it's just not worth $30.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Nars matte lip pencil in Dolce Vita for at least 10 years. It has been my signature lip color. This new formulation is AWFUL. It smells like paint thinner and severely dries and chaps your lips. The second you take the cap off, the smell of chemicals hits you. Why did they get rid of the OG? It was already a long-wear matte lip pencil. Nars' really dropping the ball. Still on the hunt to find my Dolce Vita dupe :( REFY Lip Blush in Cinnamon is pretty close if you mix it with Vicotria Beckham lip tint in Je'Taime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lip pencil for free as an add-on with a purchase. I wanted to love this product because I really loved how the color looked on me. I would only put a little on in the middle of my upper and bottom lips, then blended it out with my finger. Unfortunately, I won't be able to use this product anymore because 1. You cannot twist it or sharpen it and 2. The product breaks VERY easily. If you have shaky hands, don't bother buying this product. If you move the cap slightly while take it off or putting it back on, it can mess up the actual lip product. I accidentally cut off a piece and after a few uses, it was mangled. I had to take a sewing needle and scoop out the product to put into a small tin to use. There is more product inside the pencil that you are completely unable to get to because it does not twist nor can you sharpen it. I would love if they changed the packaging of this product so it would last more than a few days. I am very disappointed because the actual color and consistency was so nice. Will not be buying again.

reviews.review_title: out with the new, in with the old!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color but i'm genuinely heartbroken about this formula shift. This new formula is incredibly drying and it will crack, flake, and sink into your lines within only an hour or two, even with appropriate prep. Touching this product up is challenging because you'll find yourself rolling a smooth pencil over flaky existing product which is just sort of a disaster overall. The old formula was not long-lasting by any means, but that never bothered me because it was easy to touch up, was never drying, and looked nice and smooth the entire time I had it on before it would begin to wear (and it wore WELL). reviews.review_title: Loved the rich, bold, long-lasting color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NARS - Powermatte High-Intensity Long-Lasting Lip Pencil Color: Cruella - 185 - passionate scarlet red is a beautiful rich dark red with cool, blue undertones and a long- lasting matte finish. It has semi-opaque pigmentation that applies boldly and evenly to lips. It's a gorgeous shade of a deeper red without being too deep / dark. I believe this shade would look good on any complexion. Im fair skinned and it wasnt too bold for me. The texture was light, velvety, and smooth enough to glide on without tugging on the lips. It appeared smoother, flat, and matte for hours. This shade wore well for up to eight hours, did not cause drying, and left my lips perfectly enhanced. The formula is truly long-lasting with rich, bold color. The texture is nice and velvety, way  smoother than other matte lip products I have tired. I love how it glided and did not feather and dry out. It lasted through my entire work shift even after drinking and talking all day. I loved that this product is light and applies thin and doesnt have a lot of excess moisture and creaminess. The pigmentation was bold and rich and provided seamless and semi-opaque coverage. I loved that this product was easy to apply along the lips and comfortable, it did not break nor did tug. Its easy to reapply and doesnt cake, crack, build up, or dry out my lips. I also love matte because its not messy and I dont have to worry about getting lipstick on my teeth or it smearing. I would highly recommend because this is a higher end, quality product that doesnt dry me out like other products. Its worth the splurge and I would love to try other colors.

It's incredibly easy to apply, and the color payoff is simply stunning. NARS has truly nailed the high-intensity aspect, as it stays vibrant for hours.  Overall, I can't get enough of the NARS Powermatte High-Intensity Lip Pencil. It's become a staple in my makeup routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a long-lasting, vibrant lip color that's a breeze to apply. Thank you, BzzAgent, for introducing me to this fantastic product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this NARS lip pencil in the shade u201cAmerican woman - chestnut roseu201d for over a week now and I am absolutely impressed. I am a dry lip girlie and struggle to find creamy lip products that dont accentuate my dry lips or peeling skin. This product is a no brainer for me and has gained a permanent spot in my purse. Its creamy, non drying, a beautiful formula and pretty long wearing for being a creamier formula. I apply this lip pencil and then wait about 5-10 minutes before eating, drinking or touching my lips and it really helps it set into the skin for a longer wear. You can also put a very thin tissue on your lips and dab a little powder on top of the tissue for a more matte and long wear if thats what youre going for. As a busy mom of three I absolutely appreciate the ease of having essentially two products in one (lip liner and lipstick). Its a mom must have!  *I received this product for free for my honest review*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Nars Lip Pencil is highly pigmented and stays on the lips for a long time. It is easy to line and fill in the lips. It is really smooth and one swipe really is all that is needed for a great color payoff. There is plenty of time to perfect and blend or layer the color before it dries. Once it dries, it doesnt smudge or budge until something oily is eaten or cleanser is used. As with a lot of long lasting lip products, it does have a dry feel once it sets but a gloss or balm can be always put on top. The American Woman shade is a great  rosy neutral that looks like my lips but better. I am not a fan of having to sharpen it with a sharpener but I do like that this involves less packaging and you can sharpen it as blunt or sharp as desired. Great matte lip pencil that lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Powermatte Lip Pencil in Take Me Home in exchange for a fair and honest review.   To start, the color is true to the pencil - it is a lightish pinky nude and looks great against my neutral light skin (the color is very similarities to my natural lip color but a bit pinker and tanner). It is definitely matte as promised. It is very creamy so it goes on extremely smoothly very easily. It dries down relatively quickly, only taking about 30 seconds. It is not transfer proof, but there is very little color transfer when touched. It looks great on its own, under similarly colored lipsticks or similar/clear lipglosses. It lasts really well, too, surviving hours despite talking and drinking through a straw regularly. Overall, it's quite a lovely lip pencil in a pretty color! My only qualm is that it can be fairly drying on the lips... it makes the lips feel kind of tight and dry, and even looks a bit dry (if there's no lipstick or gloss over top). This is easily solved by prepping the lips extra well beforehand, and it's certainly not as bad as many matte lippies out there - but it prevents it from being perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good matte lipstick, and Ive been really into NARS recently. Im in absolutely love with American Woman shade.   For the record, I luckily received this product for free in exchange for my honest review, which it is a privileged to me as Im a sucker for NARS. ud83dude0a   This is a chestnut rose. Its a very pretty nude shade with a hint of pink and warmth that I really need with my skin tone. I love the size and shape of the pencil because it allows for awesome precision, perfect for lining, defining, and filling in lips. One u201ccoatu201d is enough to completely cover your lips. The texture is amazing though - its extremely lightweight and doesnt become crumbly or drying once its dry. Its very much like ink once its on. Its definitely a great formula!   On the longevity front, this lipstick stayed put for about 3 hours, without flaking. While it did not leave a mark when I drank water, the formula definitely transferred during a meal.   Pigmented, long lasting and comfortable, this lipstick is exactly as advertised. I love the sophisticated vibe this shade gives off. When paired with a cat-eye and a neutral eyeshadow, it really give the healthy and natural kind of look. This lipstick is the one for glamorous events and day to day wear. Absolutely love it and totally worth $30.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for an honest review.  It applies really nicely and does feel silky and smooth when you first apply it.  After a few hours of wear though, it definitely feels drying on the lips, but it is a matte formula so I guess thats to be expected.  It for sure has lasting power though and lasts until you remove it with make up remover.  It has minimal transfer which is great!  If it didnt feel quite so drying on the lips it would for sure have received 5 stars from me!  I did end up adding a little bit of gloss on top, but of course that will affect how long it lasts.  But overall, its a great product and Id definitely recommend it!  The color is great too!!

reviews.review_title: I must get the rest of the shades!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First day using this Lip Pencil and I absolutely love it. Long-lasting and very pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip pencil is great! It goes on so smooth and it doesnt make my lips feel dry. Its also very pigmented. It lasted throughout the day. I will definitely be repurchasing other colors. I definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 recommend this lip pencil, super buttery formula that lasts and is great for dry lips. The Take Me Home color is super pretty on my light/neutral skin. Going to buy new colors bc this has become a quick staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color was not for me but formula is smooth like butter. Glides on easy. Feels like butter on the lips. Would try a different color next time that suits my skin tone better. Took 2-3 swipes to get pigment to show.
Beautiful color!  Works great and looks amazing!  Keeps my lipstick from bleeding!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these Nars matte lip pencils. They go on so smoothlyu2014they just glide onto my lips. I love that the color stays on and doesnt get wiped off when I eat. This color really makes my lips pop to elevate my look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture! With setting powder it stays all day. Super soft finish and perfect red for my complexion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I received so many compliments from my friends. my lips looked fresh, bright and hydrated. I did not feel dry lips after them. Stayed on all night, no smudges. I recommend this product for use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the standout features of NARS Lip Pencils is their incredibly creamy texture. They glide onto the lips smoothly, making them easy to apply and allowing for precise outlining and filling. This creamy texture also makes them comfortable to wear throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this amazing Nars Lip Pencil in the shade: Take Me Home.  I am in love with this product! Its very soft and cute!! I highly recommend to everyone! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A first swatch and this product was soo pigmented and vibrant . Loved wearing it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip pencil is to die for! It lasts all day and barely transfers. It is super pigmented so you do not need too much and it's a quick lip for when you're on the go. Definitely would recommend this formula and color to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pencil is small and cute, I love this nude color as it suits for asian yellow skintone like mine. The texture is quite moist and easy to apply. I love the package and how it comes handy to put in my daily makeup bag. As it is matte but does not dry your lips, it tends to fade away quite easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fan of Nars lip pencils, this was not a disappointment. I love the packaging and being able to see the color right away. It is so nice to be able to use it as lip liner and lip color. It is very creamy, easy to apply and last for hours without drying out the lips. The color is a beautiful browny/pink shade that I can see myself wearing a lot and favoring most people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: High pigment with a smooth and creamy texture. Dries down matte but feels so hydrated!
